## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on a physical device (if applicable)

### Platform-Specific

**iOS:**
- [ ] SwiftLint passes with no violations
- [ ] Code follows MVVM + Clean Architecture patterns
- [ ] UI tested on iPhone and iPad
- [ ] Accessibility labels added where needed

**Android:**
- [ ] ktlint passes with no violations
- [ ] Code follows MVI + Clean Architecture patterns
- [ ] UI tested on different screen sizes
- [ ] Accessibility content descriptions added where needed

**Backend:**
- [ ] Firebase rules updated if schema changed
- [ ] Cloud Functions have error handling
- [ ] Indexes created for new queries
- [ ] Functions tested with emulator

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] README updated if necessary
- [ ] Architecture docs updated if schema changed
